actions.name: Multiattack (Vampire Form Only)
actions.description: Makes two attacks, only one of which can be a bite.

actions.name: Unarmed Strike (Vampire Form Only)
actions.description: Instead of damage, can grapple (escape DC 18).

actions.name: Bite (Bat or Vampire Form Only)
actions.description: Target's max HP reduced by necrotic taken; vampire heals same amount. Reduction lasts until long rest; slain humanoid buried rises next night as vampire spawn under vampire's control.

actions.name: Charm
actions.description: Humanoid within 30 ft. that can see the vampire makes DC 17 WIS save or is charmed for up to 24 hours; regards vampire as trusted friend and is a willing bite target. Repeats save when harmed by vampire/ally; immune for 24 hours after save success/effect ends.

actions.name: Children of the Night (1/Day)
actions.description: Summons 2d4 bat or rat swarms (or 3d6 wolves outdoors, sunless). Arrive in 1d4 rounds and act as allies for 1 hour or until dismissed/death.

legendaryActions.name: Move
legendaryActions.description: Moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
